CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 味道；口味；滋味；味觉；品味；鉴赏力；偏好；兴趣；爱好；感受；体验；审美；趣味；偏爱；一口；一点儿；少许品尝的东西；<美俚>酒
尝；尝起来；品尝；吃；喝；尝试；意识到；感觉到；感受；（短暂地）体验；领略；经历；辨别味道；察觉…的味道；有…的味道；试吃；试喝；<古>喜欢；欣赏；鉴赏（艺术、音乐等）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 雅观的；有鉴赏力的；趣味高雅的；有滋味的
无鉴赏力；格调低俗；没滋味

word_group.brief_definition: 人的爱憎好恶是无法解释的, 人各有所好

word_group.phrase: a bitter taste in the mouth

word_group.brief_definition: 因初次获胜而得到激励；尝到甜头

word_group.phrase: a bad taste in the mouth
a nasty taste in someone's mouth
a bitter taste in someone's mouth

word_group.brief_definition: 以牙还牙；以其治人之道还治其人之身
word_group.phrase: give someone a taste of their own medicine
a bad taste in someone's mouth
a nasty taste in the mouth

word_group.brief_definition: 口感好；口味好；良好品味
甜的滋味；甜味；甘甜口感

bilingual.source: If not, what do you think one might taste like?
bilingual.target: 如果没有，你觉得它尝起来会是什么味道？

bilingual.source: One piece of Baklava after your feast can leave a good taste in your mouth.
bilingual.target: 宴会后吃一块甜点会在嘴里留下好味道。

bilingual.source: I enjoy the tangy taste of lemon in my tea.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢在茶里加柠檬的味道浓烈的味道。

bilingual.source: The taste of pawpaw is very sweet.

bilingual.target: 洋葱有一种刺鼻的味道。

list.abstract: Taste，英文单词。同名的还有一个食品公司。
《Taste》是Red Velvet演唱的一首歌曲，由박성희 (Jam Factory) 、PENOMECO作词，Dwayne `Dem Jointz` Abernathy作曲，于2018年11月30日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Strange, because it's quite an adult taste actually.
yingyinNormal.zh: 奇怪的是，吃起来是大人的味道。

yingyinNormal.en: You can taste all the flavor of the rye. You can taste all the ingredients. The beer glaze is also fantastic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能尝到黑麦的味道，所有原料的味道，啤酒糊，很好吃。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, imagine every great taste in the world being combined into infinite combinations. Tastes that no one has tried yet! Discoveries to be made!
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在想像世上所有的美味可以组合成无限可能的味道，去尝试没人尝过的味道，新味道等着被发掘。

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks man, that would have been really hard to describe. What is that taste?
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢了，不然还真难形容。什么味道？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't take it off too soon. Let it bubble a bit, or you'll taste the flour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别过早拿起来，让它沸腾一下，不然味道就不好了。

yingyinNormal.en: So, tell me, you ever had a taste of the pawpaw fruit down there in the Seeonee?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那告诉我，你尝过小移山产的枇杷果的味道吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Here. Chew it slowly. Only think about the taste. See? Not really.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里, 慢慢地嚼它，想像那种味道。感觉到了吗? 一点点。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm afraid it doesn't taste very nice. Open wide, please. Disgusting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我必须得提醒你，这味道可不太好，请你把嘴巴长大。天啊，这药太难吃啦。

yingyinNormal.en: I am confident. Surely. I think the taste will deliver. The health aspect for sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很有信心。我认为味道说明一切。在健康方面肯定没问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Do I need medicine? Just a little spoonful. I'm afraid it doesn't taste very nice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么我需要吃药吗？只要吃一勺这药就行了。不过这味道可能不太美味哦。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. It's not the taste, right? It's the texture of the skin, it's gross. Yeah. I don't want blueberries either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吧。都不说味道如何，蓝莓皮那个口感，太恶心了。我也不想吃蓝莓了。

yingyinNormal.en: The sound of it. This is a beautiful loaf. And the taste of it. I'd have that any time of the day. It's delicious.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听一下声音，一条很漂亮的面包，尝一下味道，我一天之中随时会有面包，很美味。

yingyinNormal.en: Do I need medicine? Just a little spoonful. I'm afraid it doesn't taste very nice. It tastes like an old shoe full of jam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我需要吃药吗？只要一小勺。恐怕味道不是很好。尝起来像装满了果酱的旧鞋子。

yingyinNormal.en: If a potential mate has managed to pass all these tests, there's still one more: the infamous first kiss, a rich and complex exchange of tactile and chemical cues, such as the smell of one's breath, and the taste of their mouth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果有某个可能的对象通过这些检验，最后还有一项：恶名昭彰的初吻，初吻交换丰富而复杂的触觉及化学信号，像是呼吸的气味及嘴巴的味道。

yingyinNormal.en: Krabby Patty. I can almost taste it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蟹黄堡。我差点就吃到了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, well, you're a man of good taste.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，你很有品位啊，哈哈。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Do you want a little taste of Pheebs?
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿，你想尝尝菲比的厉害吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Enjoy the taste of success, Riley. It's sweet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 享受成功的滋味吧，莱丽，是甜的哦。

yingyinNormal.en: Why the fruit cup, B? Lost your taste for yogurt?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么是什锦水果，B？不喝酸奶了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You guys are hilarious. I don't need to taste those.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们俩真是太有意思了，我不需要试吃啦。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Charles has both an expensive <highlight>taste</highlight> of lifestyle and a pretty hierarchical view of the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 查尔斯既有昂贵的生活方式品味，对世界也有着相当的等级观念。

sense_info_list.en: find out the flavor of something by taking a little in the mouth

word_usage.usage: taste作为系动词“尝起来”使用时，后可直接用形容词；物作主语时，虽有被动意味，但不用被动语态。
作为“喜爱，爱好”名词使用时常跟介词in使用；作为“···的味道”使用时常与介词of连用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可口的；美味的；有吸引力的；使人动心的；极好的；给人印象深刻的
adj. 无味的；不可口的；无品位的；无鉴赏力的；格调低俗的；庸俗的

word_family.mean: n. 味道；味；滋味；口味；味觉；品位；感受；情趣；爱好；体会

sense_info_list.en: the sense by which sweet, sour, bitter, or salty flavors are detected through sense organs ( taste buds ) in the tongue
find out the flavor of something by taking a little in the mouth

word_usage.usage:
taste作系动词，表示“有...味道”。此时，taste不用于进行时或被动语态，且后面接表语（多为形容词）。
示例：这肉味道很好。
误 The meat is tasted well.
误 The meat is tasting well.
正 The meat tastes good.
taste常与介词like或of搭配出现。taste like表示“吃起来像”，而taste of表示“吃起来有...的味道”。

taste表“味道”，为可数名词，“...的味道”用the taste of表达。味道浓或淡，可用much或little修饰。
示例：I don't like the taste of olives.
我不喜欢橄榄的味道。

taste表（品尝的）“少量，一口”时，为单数名词，多用a taste of表达。
示例：We have a taste of the white wine he's brought.
我们尝了尝他带来的白葡萄酒。
“在...方面的鉴赏力”多用taste in表达，taste为不可数名词。
表示“爱好...”时，taste常与介词for/in连用，为可数名词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可口的；美味的；有吸引力的；使人动心的；极好的；给人印象深刻的
adj. 无味的；不可口的；无品位的；无鉴赏力的；格调低俗的；庸俗的

word_family.mean: n. 味道；味；滋味；口味；味觉；品位；感受；情趣；爱好；体会

sense_info_list.en: the sense by which sweet; sour; bitter; or salty flavors are detected through sense organs ( taste buds ) in the tongue

examination_example.sentence: A dry mouth may reduce <highlight>taste</highlight> sensitivity, but <highlight>taste</highlight> is restored by drinking fluids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 口干可能会降低味觉敏感度，但喝水可恢复味觉。

examination_example.sentence: The air you breathe in a plane dries out your mouth and nose, which can affect your sense of <highlight>taste</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 飞机上呼吸的空气会使你的嘴和鼻子变得干燥，这会影响到你的味觉。

examination_example.sentence: You can make your <highlight>taste</highlight> buds active again by drinking water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以通过喝水让你的味蕾重新活跃起来。

examination_example.sentence: French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte was known to be unimpressed by the declining <highlight>taste</highlight> of early 18th century cooking, but under pressure to entertain Paris's high society, he too called Creme to his kitchen at Tuileries Palace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 众所周知法国皇帝 Napoleon Bonaparte 对18世纪初期衰退的烹饪口味并不感兴趣，但在招待巴黎上流社会的压力下，他也找 Careme 去了他在 Tuileries Palace 的厨房。

examination_example.sentence: PepsiCo's contribution was to produce healthier snacks that still <highlight>tasted</highlight> good.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司的贡献是生产出更健康，而且味道还不错的零食。

sense_info_list.en: find out the flavor of something by taking a little in the mouth
the ability to choose and enjoy what is good or beautiful
recognize by the sense of taste

word_usage.usage: “在...方面的鉴赏力”多用taste in表达，taste为不可数名词。

taste表（品尝的）“少量，一口”时，为单数名词，多用a taste of表达。
示例：We have a taste of the white wine he's brought.
我们尝了尝他带来的白葡萄酒。

taste表“味道”，为可数名词，“...的味道”用the taste of表达。味道浓或淡，可用much或little修饰。
示例：I don't like the taste of olives.
我不喜欢橄榄的味道。
taste常与介词like或of搭配出现。taste like表示“吃起来像”，而taste of表示“吃起来有...的味道”。

taste作系动词，表示“有...味道”。此时，taste不用于进行时或被动语态，且后面接表语（多为形容词）。
示例：这肉味道很好。
误 The meat is tasted well.
误 The meat is tasting well.
正 The meat tastes good.
表示“爱好...”时，taste常与介词for/in连用，为可数名词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可口的；美味的；有吸引力的；使人动心的；极好的；给人印象深刻的
adj. 无味的；不可口的；无品位的；无鉴赏力的；格调低俗的；庸俗的
n. 品试员；试样；试味酒杯；试味取样器

word_family.mean: n. 味道；味；滋味；口味；味觉；品位；感受；情趣；爱好；体会

examination_example.sentence: Join us to <highlight>taste</highlight> a variety of fresh local food and drinks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和我们一起品尝各种新鲜的当地食物和饮料。

examination_example.sentence: Visiting an apple event is a good chance to see, and often <highlight>taste</highlight>, a wide variety of apples.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参观苹果活动是一个很好的机会，可以见到并品尝各种各样的苹果。

examination_example.sentence: Why do tea tasters <highlight>taste</highlight> tea with milk?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么品茶师品茶用牛奶？

examination_example.sentence: French strawberries do not <highlight>taste</highlight> like cardboard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 法国草莓尝起来不像硬纸板。

examination_example.sentence: Although it doesn't <highlight>taste</highlight> of anything special, it's still worth a try.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然尝起来没有什么特别的味道，但还是值得一试。

examination_example.sentence: Tea <highlight>tastes</highlight> much better with milk.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 茶加牛奶味道更好。

examination_example.sentence: The best part–particularly to my <highlight>taste</highlight>, dulled by months of cold- weather root vegetables–was to the market.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最精彩的部分是早上7点去市场探险，尤其是对我的因为几个月的寒冷天气只能吃根菜类蔬菜而变得迟钝的口味来说。

examination_example.sentence: On his way to Bukhara he gets a <highlight>taste</highlight> of police methods when suspected of drug dealing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在去布哈拉的路上，当他被怀疑贩毒时，他体验到了警察的手段。

examination_example.sentence: It gave my kids the sweet <highlight>taste</highlight> of helping others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这让我的孩子有了帮助别人的美好体验。

examination_example.sentence: She was extremely pretty, and her house was a reflection of herself, everything in good <highlight>taste</highlight> and in perfect order.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她非常漂亮，她的房子是她自己的写照，一切都很有品位，井井有条。

examination_example.sentence: Enjoy fun history as we take you through San Francisco for a free <highlight>taste</highlight> of ice cream.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着我们带你穿过旧金山去免费品尝冰淇淋，享受有趣的历史。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可口的；美味的；有吸引力的；使人动心的；极好的；给人印象深刻的
n. 品试员；试样；试味酒杯；试味取样器

word_family.mean: n. 味道；味；滋味；口味；味觉；品位；感受；情趣；爱好；体会

sense_info_list.en: find out the flavor of something by taking a little in the mouth

examination_example.sentence: Where can the visitors <highlight>taste</highlight> the best Italian food?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游客在哪里可以品尝到最好的意大利美食？

examination_example.sentence: Each type of tea has a different <highlight>taste</highlight> and a different colour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每种茶都有不同的味道和不同的颜色。

examination_example.sentence: It looks the same as any other hamburger, and so is the <highlight>taste</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它看起来和任何其他汉堡包一样，味道和其他汉堡包也一样。

examination_example.sentence: I think tea will <highlight>taste</highlight> better with some milk in it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得茶里加点牛奶会更好喝。

examination_example.sentence: There are a lot of vegetables and fruit to choose from and they <highlight>taste</highlight> delicious.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有很多蔬菜和水果可供选择，而且味道鲜美。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>tastes</highlight> delicious!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它尝起来很美味！

examination_example.sentence: Based on your <highlight>taste</highlight>, you can make different kinds of Chinese dumplings using different fillings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据你的口味，你可以用不同的馅料做不同种类的中国饺子。

examination_example.sentence: While she was in Milan, she developed a <highlight>taste</highlight> for fine art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在米兰期间，她对美术产生了浓厚的兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese restaurants provide meat with bones to meet local people's <highlight>tastes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国餐馆提供带骨头的肉，以满足当地人的口味。

examination_example.sentence: They invite performers to <highlight>taste</highlight> the food made by themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们邀请表演者品尝他们自己制作的食物。

examination_example.sentence: If nothing else, it will give you a good <highlight>taste</highlight> of what a hard life farming is.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不出意外，它会让你很好地体会到耕作的艰辛生活。

examination_example.sentence: A quick <highlight>taste</highlight> of what teaching is about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 快速了解教学内容。

word_usage.usage:
taste作系动词，表示“有...味道”。此时，taste不用于进行时或被动语态，且后面接表语（多为形容词）。
示例：这肉味道很好。
误 The meat is tasted well.
误 The meat is tasting well.
正 The meat tastes good.
taste常与介词like或of搭配出现。taste like表示“吃起来像”，而taste of表示“吃起来有...的味道”。

taste表“味道”，为可数名词，“...的味道”用the taste of表达。味道浓或淡，可用much或little修饰。
示例：I don't like the taste of olives.
我不喜欢橄榄的味道。

taste表（品尝的）“少量，一口”时，为单数名词，多用a taste of表达。
示例：We have a taste of the white wine he's brought.
我们尝了尝他带来的白葡萄酒。
“在...方面的鉴赏力”多用taste in表达，taste为不可数名词。
表示“爱好...”时，taste常与介词for/in连用，为可数名词。
